name: Spalience
description:
Spalience.

A game where you take the role of an astronaut with the mission to catch all the aliens in space. But it's not that easy... Guns and extremely sharp spikes have been set up by aliens. Can you dodge the obstacles without dying?

Try Spalience now!

by Pardex

PS: Threre is not much use for money at the moment, I may change that later tho. Who knows...
